human_solution_reference: Applied triangle inequality optimization (Elkan's algorithm) to skip unnecessary distance calculations, reducing complexity from O(nkd) to O(nkd/b) where b is the pruning factor.
description: Optimize the K-Means clustering single iteration using Elkan's algorithm for distance computation pruning.
optimization_hints: Use triangle inequality to skip redundant distance calculations
Maintain upper and lower bounds for cluster assignments
Consider Cython optimizations for inner loops
